info.description: This is documentation for FlexxWare API from Soluvine GmbH.  You can find out more about Soluvine solutions at [https://soluvine.com/flexxlink](https://soluvine.com/flexxlink).  </br> The FlexxWare API is using REST API to define its endpoints. This page also provides sample Authorization information and sample responses to each API endpoint.
info.title: FlexxWare for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations

typeId.description: Validated against the list of Document types in D365 F&O ECM Document Management

referenceTypeId.description: Validated against the list of Reference types in D365 F&O ECM Document Management

trader.description: RecId of the Worker entry in D365 F&O

barcodeId.description: Id of the barcode as generated in D365 F&O ECM Document Management.

typeId.description: Validated against the list of Document types in D365 F&O ECM Document Management

connectionId.description: Must match the Connection name in D365 F&O ECM Document Management

referenceTypeId.description: Validated against the list of Reference types in D365 F&O ECM Document Management

trader.description: RecId of the Worker entry in D365 F&O

barcodeId.description: Dedicated to barcode handling. If barcode is sent, the following values are taken from D365 only: accountTypestr, custVendAccount, orderTypeStr, orderId, agreementId, documentDate, documentId, inventBatchId, projId, quotationId, assetId.

connectionId.description: Name of the connection as defined in D365. Used with the fileUrl value.

fileData.description: Base64 encoded document. Accepts PDF, MSG, TIFF, JPG.
Base64 encoded document. Accepts PDF, MSG, TIFF, JPG.

processingTime.description: Precision of two digits. Unit defined in D365.
Precision of two digits. Unit defined in D365.

example.Message: An exception occured when deserializing the request - Exception occurred when parsing and deserializing parameter '_contract' - 'Parameter '_contract' is not found within the request content body.
